body_html:
But what's the point of having both tf.slice and tf.strided_slice? Is there
anything that the latter can not do and the former can?

On Wed, 28 Sep 2016 at 13:37 Andrew Selle notifications@github.com wrote:

I have no immediate plans to deprecate tf.slice(). I think we should
update the documentation, but I'm not sure we should deprecate it even in
1.0.

—

anything that the latter can not do and the former can?
